item.title: Trump backs Senate deal that would end government shutdown
item.description: President Donald Trump said he approves of a pending deal in the Senate that would bring the record-breaking U.S. government shutdown to an end.

item.title: What Democrats are — and aren't — getting in the deal that could end the government shutdown

item.title: Government shutdown: House will vote on Senate deal ASAP, Speaker Johnson says

item.title: Government shutdown could be headed for end as Senate passes first stage of new deal
